meta_description: Visit the San Diego Automotive Museum, San Diego's premier transportation museum. Located in Balboa Park, our mission is to tell the story of the social and technological past, present, and future of motorized vehicles throughout its collections, exhibitions, and educational programs.
hours_text:
### Single Day Pass

Plan ahead and purchase your tickets online. Tickets are valid for seven days from purchase.

[ Buy Tickets ](/products/admission)

### Annual Pass

Pay one price and visit all year! Single, family, and premium membership options are available.

[ Buy Membership ](/pages/memberships)

### Groups & Organizations

Groups and organizations must schedule their visit a minimum of**two weeks** in advance. _See details._

[ Make Reservations ](/pages/group-reservations)

admission_text:
There's always something new happening at the San Diego Automotive Museum. From car-themed events, to rotating exhibits, to special admission offers, you'll find a new experience every time you visit.
